holder.title: No Exit

holder.title: Tulip Chair

holder.title: Visual Instructive Guide

holder.title: Transformations
holder.description: Part of a black and white 2D collection of images focusing on creating 3D illusions

holder.title: Dude Security
holder.description: This is a logo design I came up with for a company called Dude Security

holder.title: Dorian Grey
holder.description:
The book cover I did for my Typography class. I went through a few different options but I think
this shows the split between his outward appearance and the disintigration of his soul.

holder.title: Midnight Madness
holder.description: The logo I created for one of Northeastern Tennis Team's annual charity event.

holder.title: Vagabond
holder.description: A short film I acted, produced, and directed that came in the top 16 of 128 entries in the Campus MovieFest Contest
